channel.title: [317]Server Wont Work for anybody[317]
channel.description: Alright this server is new but ive made 3 other ones and they were all up for a couple weeks till my mom crashed em,for this one ive portforwarded,changed port to name of what its called,re-did no-ip thing, ive got source and no-ip.duc running at same time, ive already tried restarting my computer and having the internet router unplugged and then plugging it back in when screen comes back, i dont know what else to do, ive done all those things a couple times, can someone please help, also if it helps my house lost power for a couple seconds and that was when my server crashed and the only reason im making this one, can somebody please help me i got people that are waiting to play another one of my servers Edit:Also if i use a downloadable client and put the ip address as 127.0.0.1 i can log in but no1 else can if that is of any use no problem

item.title: [317]Server Wont Work for anybody[317]
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

I have the same problem, I had a working webclient were people could connect but I somehow I managed to corrupt it so I remade it and now people can’t connect to my server anymore (they can download cache and stuff though, so only connecting is the problem) . Just like you it works for myself if I change ip to localhost.

Can someone help us? I have no idea what’s wrong…

EDIT:

Lord_fear helped me find what the problem was (at least for me) It was that my port was set to my IP but when my router was unplugged or reset my IP was changed. I opened up my portforwarding settings page and changed the IP and my client worked again
Hope this was your problem to and that this helps you to.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Server Wont Work for anybody[317]
item.dc:creator: @mager_dd mager dd
item.description:
@mager_dd wrote:

dude ur dumb, my ip wont work for other people and the 127.0.0.1 thing is on the download client not the webclient other people use,wow

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Server Wont Work for anybody[317]
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

You have to change the I-p from 127.0.0.1, to your no-ip ip.

GF LEECHER.

Read full topic
